Trade/Device Name(s): PRECICHEK Cloudia Blood Glucose Monitoring System
PRECICHEK ACH Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PRECICHEK Cloudia Blood Glucose Monitoring System using electrochemical biosensor for quantitative measurement of blood glucose in capillary whole blood from fingertips.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing of blood glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips by people with diabetes at home to aid in monitoring diabetes control; for single-patient use only and not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
